name: EV-5
details:
Expression PedalThe EV-5 Expression Pedal is designed for use with keyboards or other Expression-compatible instruments and devices, providing a more dynamic performance. You can set the minimum volume to the level of your choice, thereby determining the maximum effect of the pedal.
Cable length
2 m (TRS 1/4” plug)
Controls
Main Volume Pedal, Minimum Volume Knob

3-7/16 inches
